hero.headline: Visualizing the Art of the Possible for Schneider Electric
hero.subtitle: We brought 6 AI-driven concepts to life for ADIPEC 2025, transforming complex autonomous operations visions into compelling visual experiences that showcase the future of energy management.

challenge.label: The Challenge
challenge.heading: Visualizing the Art of the Possible
challenge.intro: Schneider Electric needed to showcase 6 AI-driven concepts at ADIPEC 2025—not just explain existing technology, but paint a compelling vision of autonomous operations and what the future could look like.

cards.title: 6 AI Concepts
cards.description: Six distinct AI-driven visions for autonomous operations, each requiring unique visual storytelling to communicate possibility without overpromising.

cards.title: Future Visualization
cards.description: Showing the 'art of the possible'—not just current capabilities, but where AI-powered energy management is heading. Inspiring without being speculative.

cards.title: ADIPEC Presence
cards.description: Standing out at the world's largest energy conference. Creating visual experiences that position Schneider as the leader in AI-driven autonomous operations.

approach.label: Our Approach
approach.heading: Agentic Experience Design for Enterprise AI
approach.intro: We applied our AXD framework to create visual experiences that communicate AI capabilities while maintaining human understanding and trust.

steps.title: System Mapping
steps.description: Deep-dive into Schneider's AI architecture to understand data flows, decision points, and human-agent interactions.

steps.title: Visual Translation
steps.description: Transformed technical schematics into intuitive visual hierarchies that reveal complexity progressively.

steps.title: Design System
steps.description: Created a cohesive visual language with standardized layouts, motion rules, and color logic across all presentations.

steps.title: Production Pipeline
steps.description: Built an efficient Figma-to-PowerPoint workflow that reduced export errors and enabled rapid iterations.

design_system.label: Design System
design_system.heading: A Visual Language for Autonomous Intelligence
design_system.intro: We created a consistent design language combining dark spatial layers, neon accents, and glass-like depth. This approach gave Schneider's AI presentations a futuristic but credible tone.

elements.title: Color Palette
elements.description: Dark spatial base with Schneider green accents and cyan highlights for data visualization.

elements.title: Typography
elements.description: Inter Bold — Clean, technical, highly legible at any size. Perfect for data-dense presentations.

elements.title: Visual Principles
elements.description: Progressive disclosure of complexity, glass-like depth and layering, animated data flows, consistent motion language.

testimonial.quote: The team understood exactly what we needed: a way to communicate complex AI systems without overwhelming our audience. The result was presentations that actually generated conversations instead of glazed-over looks.
testimonial.author: VP of Digital Solutions

capabilities.label: Capabilities Applied
capabilities.heading: Agentic Experience Design in Action
capabilities.body: This project showcased our core AXD principles: making AI systems understandable, building appropriate trust through clear visualization, and creating interfaces that support human decision-making. We worked closely with Schneider's VP and Senior Designer, coordinating iterations and building a production workflow that will serve them for years to come.
